code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{UserContext}from'../../App';import'./Roadmap.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const timelineData=[{stage:'Stage 1',items:['Bakso Token Launch','Bakso Dapp Released','Referrals Smart Contract','Strategic Partnerships','Soup Kitchen Launch']},{stage:'Stage 2',items:['No Loss Lottery','Launch Pad','Ambassador Program ']},{stage:'Stage 3',items:['Major Exchange Listing','Airdrop Event','Staking']}];const TimelineItem=_ref=>{let{data,idx,isDark}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"timeline-item itemNo".concat(idx+1," ").concat(isDark?'dark':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"timeline-item-content ".concat(isDark?'dark':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:data.stage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:data.items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[item," "]},index))})]})});};const Timeline=()=>{const{isDark}=useContext(UserContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"timeline",id:"roadmap",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-12 roadmapTitle ".concat(isDark?'dark':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Roadmap"})}),timelineData.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"timeline-container  ".concat(isDark?'dark':''),children:timelineData.map((data,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TimelineItem,{data:data,idx:idx,isDark:isDark},idx))})]})})});};export default Timeline;
